title: Fact Check: Did Bihar DGP Gupteshwar Pandey resign from his position? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amid the ongoing mystery regarding the death of Bollywood actor Sushant Singh Rajput, a piece of sensational news has been circulating on social media with claims that Bihar DGP Gupteshwar Pandey has resigned from his position.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above claim and found it to be false.

We checked his Twitter handle, where he has explicitly clarified that it is just a rumour and he has not submitted his resignation.

“A news portal of Bihar has created a sensation by running a piece of false news about my resignation from my job. What level of journalism would you call it?, ” he tweeted in Hindi. ( Translated by Google translation)

We checked and found that the news was originally shared by Maurya News18. However, after IPS Gupteshwar Pandey issued a clarification, the publication updated the article and apologised for the gaffe.
